amendment.description: To clarify the fiscal year 2004 funding level for a National Institute of Standards and Technology account.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3355 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3355 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To clarify the fiscal year 2004 funding level for a National Institute of Standards and Technology account.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3355 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3355 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed.
